topic.title: Sample: Task map
topic.shortdesc: This sample shows a task hierarchy derived from scenarios through task analysis. It can be found with accompanying content in samples\typedmaps\source\tasks.ditamap

body.codeblock: <map title="Task map"> <topicref navtitle="Creating maps" href="tasks/create.dita" collection-type="sequence"> <topicref navtitle="Getting started" href="tasks/getstart.dita"> <topicref navtitle="Tutorial: Creating a simple map" href="tasks/tutcreatemap.dita"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Sample: A simple map" href="samples/simplesamp.zip" format="zip"> </topicref> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Starting maps" href="tasks/start.dita" importance="required"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Adding topic references" href="tasks/addref.dita" importance="required"> <topicref navtitle="Adding simple references" href="tasks/addsimp.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Adding external references" href="tasks/addext.dita"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Adding peer references" href="tasks/addpeer.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Adding non-DITA references" href="tasks/addnon.dita"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Overriding titles and descriptions" href="tasks/override.dita"> </topicref> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Defining collection types" href="tasks/definecoll.dita"> <topicref navtitle="Defining sequences" href="tasks/defseq.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Defining families" href="tasks/deffam.dita"/> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Producing output" href="tasks/prodout.dita"> <topicref navtitle="Generating HTMLHelp" href="tasks/genhelp.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Generating Eclipse plugins" href="tasks/geneclipse.dita"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Generating PDFs" href="tasks/genpdf.dita"/> </topicref> </topicref> </map>
